statement_text: Extrapolating the mortality rate at the three sites, the researchers estimate that 17,400 baby elephant seals were killed by the virus in Patagonia, the highest figure since scientists began studying their numbers closely three decades ago (Marine Mammal Science, doi.org/mdbw).
